title: Reinforcement Learning Basics
subject: Artificial Intelligence
theory:
Learning by trial and error. 
Agent acts, World returns Reward/Penalty. 
Goal: Maximize cumulative reward. 
Challenges: Delayed reward (Chess win comes 50 moves later).

interview_questions.question: What is Exploration vs Exploitation?
interview_questions.answer: Exploit: Do what you know yields reward. Explore: Try new things to find potential bigger rewards.

real_world_use_cases.description: Learned Go by playing millions of games against itself.
